game.name: Let's Goose
game.shortDescription: Aliens are coming to town and that silly goose is looking mighty delicious. Use your weapon to slap an alien right across its alien face. Don't forget your upgrades along the way. These guys aren't goosing around. Each round provides an increase in mayhem, faster fun, and top tier goosification.
